turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. How's it going today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it's going super duper well. how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm super duper, as well. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, so glad to hear. how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I'm I'm super hungry and I need three large thin crust pizzas from Bella Lena.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ooh those sound great. what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me what's on a California-style pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, it doesn't look like they have a california style pizza on their menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have a Chicago song?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no, they do not have that either. what a bummer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As a bummer, okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have I'll have one pepperoni and sausage with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and for the others?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The other one, can you let me know what's on the chicken barbecue?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the bbq chicken pizza has cheese, bbq sauce, chicken bits, and onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic, I'll add jalapeño peppers, green peppers, and pineapple that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. and what did u want for the 3rd pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a cheese pizza with every type of cheese that they offer.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that sounds amazing. so the order is: 3 large thin crust pizzas, 1 pepperoni and sausage with extra cheese, 1 bbq chicken with jalapenos, green peppers, and pineapple, and 1 cheese pizza with all cheeses offered.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds amazing.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $45.92 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you should.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've ordered your pizzas. it'll b ready for pick up in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that will be all. Thank you, kindly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, you are so welcome
